column1: Smoque BBQ////Too much hype! BBQ is good
column2: but certainly not worth the long lines
column3: high prices and small portions. And if you're lucky enough to get a seat after waiting in a long line and spending $30 for a plastic tray with a small portion of BBQ
column4: the cafeteria-style seating sucks. We were packed in like sardines at long tables and bright lights. Save time and money by skipping this place.
